verbose_text: Taken together, our experiments all directly confirm that transfection with ATF3-siRNA inhibits cell proliferation, reduce cell viability, arrests cell cycle progression, promotes apoptosis and impedes the migration of human glioblastoma cells, thereby indirectly supporting that ATF3 plays a facilitating role in the process of tumor invasion and metastasis.
evidence: cell viability, arrests cell cycle progression, promotes apoptosis
